'''Super-Dee-Duper Delicious Meat Roll''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Shawarma Wrap]] with [[Sethos]]. The recipe for Shawarma Wrap is obtainable from [[Lambad]] for {{Item|Mora|x=2,500}}.
